alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 27 at 2:00AM MDT until October 29 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches generally above 8500 feet with lesser amounts expected for lower elevations. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys, West Elk and Sawatch Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
